Detailed Description

All the messages we need are here.

All the services .. RequestGoal is part of a5_setup, not a standard service The class we have developed included here in our node

Definition at line 35 of file sample.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

PfmsSample::PfmsSample ( ros::NodeHandle  nh)

PfmsSample constructor.

Will take the node handle and initialise the callbacks and internal variables

This sample code is provided to illustrate

  • Subscribing to standard topics (Odometry, Laser and Grid)
  • Respond to an incoming service call

visualization_msgs::MarkerArray PfmsSample::produceMarkerArray ( geometry_msgs::Pose  pose,
std_msgs::ColorRGBA  color 
)
private

Creates a MarkerArray by adding a single SPHERE marker to it, based on (pose)x,y position of pose supplied and color supplied.

Parameters
geometry_msgs::Posepose - only the x,y position will be used
std_msgs::ColorRGBAcolor - the color (including transparency) that will be used

Definition at line 230 of file sample.cpp.

void PfmsSample::seperateThread ( )

seperate thread.

The main processing thread that will run continously and utilise the data When data needs to be combined then running a thread seperate to callback will gurantee data is processed

The below loop runs until ros is shutdown

What rate shoudl we run this at?

Ex05 : Check wether the requested goal can be reached every 5 seconds.

To do this check, what information do we need?
